pr_title: Disable DoS filter by default, conditionally (de)register JMX bean.

timeline.message: Disable DoS filter by default, conditionally (de)register JMX bean.

timeline.bodyText: Use final? Or will it be possible to enable later via JMX?

replies.bodyText:
Hmm yes it is but this is the value at startup.
Will change it to final.
replies.author: sbusk
